title: Apple TV+ orders ‘Dear Edward’ as new series from Jason Katims
content:
The bestselling novel Dear Edward is set to become a TV show on Apple TV+, the company has announced. Connie Britton, Taylor Schilling, Colin O’Brien, and more will star in the show.

more…

The post Apple TV+ orders ‘Dear Edward’ as new series from Jason Katims appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The bestselling novel 'Dear Edward' is set to become a TV show on Apple TV+. Connie Britton, Taylor Schilling, Colin O’Brien, and more will star in the show.
